short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Allows sales representatives to view contacts' profile information from Eloqua in an easy to access pop-up in your browser.
short.cs: Umožňuje prodejním zástupcům zobrazit ve snadno přístupném překryvném okně v prohlížeči údaje uvedené v profilech kontaktních osob…
short.da: Tillader, at salgsrepræsentanter ser kontakters profiloplysninger fra Eloqua i et let tilgængeligt pop op-vindue i din browser.
short.de: Ermöglicht Vertriebsmitarbeitern, Profilinformationen von Kontakten aus Eloqua in einem einfach aufzurufenden Popup in Ihrem…
short.es: Permite a los representantes de ventas ver información de perfil de contactos desde Eloqua en una ventana emergente de fácil…
short.fi: Sallii myyjien katsoa Eloquan yhteyshenkilöiden profiilitietoja selaimen helppokäyttöisen ponnahdusikkunan avulla.
short.fr: Permet aux commerciaux de consulter les informations de profil des contacts à partir d'Eloqua, dans une fenêtre contextuelle facile…
short.hu: Engedélyezheti az üzletkötőknek, hogy a kapcsolattartó profiladatait megtekinthessék az Eloqua rendszeréből, a böngésző egy…
short.it: Consente ai funzionari commerciali di visualizzare le informazioni di profilo dei contatti di Eloqua in una finestra pop-up di…
short.ja: 営業担当者がEloquaからのコンタクトのプロファイル情報をアクセスの容易なブラウザ上のポップアップで表示できるようにします。
short.ko: 영업 대표가 Eloqua에서 브라우저의 편리한 팝업 창을 통해 연락처의 프로파일 정보를 볼 수 있도록 허용합니다.
short.nl: Hiermee kunnen verkopers profielgegevens van contactpersonen in Eloqua bekijken in een eenvoudig toegankelijke pop-up in de browser.
short.no: Gjør det mulig for selgere å vise kontaktpersoners profilopplysninger fra Eloqua i et lett tilgjengelig hurtigvindu i leseren.
short.pl: Umożliwia przedstawicielom handlowym wyświetlanie w przeglądarce, w łatwo dostępnym oknie wyskakującym, informacji z profili osób…
short.ru: Разрешить продавцам просматривать сведения профиля контакта из Eloqua во всплывающем окне браузера.
short.sv: Visar kontaktpersonens profilinformation från Eloqua som ett smidigt popupfönster i webbläsaren för säljaren.
short.tr: Satış temsilcilerinin, tarayıcılarındaki erişimi kolay bir açılır pencereden, Eloqua'da bulunan kişi profil bilgilerini…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Oracle Eloqua Sales Tools for Chrome is an extension for Google Chrome. The extension allows sales representatives to view contacts' profile information from Eloqua, as well as email prospects more efficiently by displaying contact information from Profiler in an easy to access pop-up in your browser.

Requirements:
-You must have an Oracle Eloqua Profiler and/or Engage license.
-Profiler must be installed and configured in your Eloqua instance.
-Sales Tools for Chrome is available with our responsive Profiler. If you are using Profiler Stream, please upgrade to our new Profiler to leverage Sales Tools for Chrome.

You agree to comply with all export laws, restrictions and regulations of any United States or applicable agency or authority, and to not directly or indirectly provide or otherwise make available any services and products of Oracle in violation of any such restrictions, laws or regulations, including, without limitation, laws, restrictions or regulations pertaining to the development, design, manufacture or production of nuclear, chemical or biological weapons or missile technology.
